src:
私菸案第二波 少將林國欽等27人緩起訴
07 Nov 2019, 10:34 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社記者蕭博文台北7日電）台北地檢署偵辦私菸案，首波8月間起訴13人，今天第二波偵結，針對原永和警衛室內衛主任林國欽少將、總統蔡英文前女隨扈張嘉玲等27名購菸者，依違反稅捐稽徵法處分緩起訴。
林國欽等27人緩起訴一年，各須支付公款新台幣3萬到30萬元不等緩起訴處分金，並接受法治教育。（編輯：李亨山）1081107

延伸閱讀
text:
The second wave of the illicit cigarette case, Major General Lin Guoqin and other 27 people sued
07 Nov 2019, 10:34 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency reporter Xiao Bowen, Taipei, 7th) The Taipei District Inspection Office investigated the case of private cigarettes. The first wave of 13 people was sued in August. Today, the second wave of investigations was directed against Major General Lin Guoqin, former director of the Yonghe Guard, and former president Tsai Ing-wen. Zhang Jialing and other 27 smokers were sued in violation of the tax collection law.
Lin Guoqin and other 27 people suspend the prosecution for one year, each of which has to pay a public loan of NT$30,000 to 300,000 yuan to suspend the prosecution and receive legal education. (Editor: Li Hengshan) 1081107
